name: beat-per-minute
title: BPM Calculator
description: Calculate BPM for a song by using the enter button on the keyboard
author: pernielsentikaer

commands.name: calculate-bpm
commands.title: BPM Calculator
commands.description: Calculate BPM for a song by using enter button on the keyboard

preferences.name: seconds
preferences.title: Reset In Seconds
preferences.description: Beat is calculated by a average of x seconds

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
